name: CTADelays
0:
”Alexa ask c. t. a. delays for any red line delays”
”are there delays on the blue line”
”tell me about delays on the purple express line”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: c. t. a. delays
des: A simple querying skill that will tell you whether or not there are delays on a certain Chicago Transit Authority "L" subway line, and if so, what kind of delays (e.g. "severe delays" or "minor delays"). No special hardware is required.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
